title: Debian 12 VM
textContent:
Debian 12 VM 
                Debian Linux is a distribution that emphasizes free software. It supports many hardware platforms.
                To create a new Proxmox VE Debian 12 VM, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.
                Copybash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/vm/debian-vm.sh)"
                ⚡ Default Settings: 2GB RAM - 2GB Storage - 2vCPU ⚡
                More Info at https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/discussions/1988
outerHTML:
Debian 12 VM

Debian Linux is a distribution that emphasizes free software. It supports many hardware platforms.

To create a new Proxmox VE Debian 12 VM, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.

bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/vm/debian-vm.sh)"

⚡ Default Settings: 2GB RAM - 2GB Storage - 2vCPU ⚡

More Info at https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/discussions/1988
